abstractText: A Nepalese paper manuscript of the Guhyasamāja. "This MS. is a copy made for Dr D. Wright, unfortunately from the same MS. from which Add.901 is taken; compare the marks of lacunae which coincide throughout" (Bendall 1883: 51), but for some minor differences.
abstractShort: A Nepalese paper manuscript of the Guhyasamāja. "This MS. is a copy made for Dr D. Wright, unfortunately from the same MS.
title: Guhyasamāja
